df-cur
blocks.content: Define the currying of ` F ` , which splits a function of two arguments into a function of the first argument, producing a function over the second argument. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-cur(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  |- wceq(ccur(c0), cmpt(s0, cdm(cdm(c0)), copab(s1, s2, wbr(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0, cv(s2)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-cur(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  ⊢ curry(c0)=(s0 ∈ dom(dom(c0))↦ { < s1, s2 > | < s0, s1 >[c0]s2 })
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
}

blocks.name: df-unc
blocks.content: Define the uncurrying of ` F ` , which takes a function producing functions, and transforms it into a two-argument function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-unc(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  |- wceq(cunc(c0), coprab(s0, s1, s2, wbr(cv(s1), cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(s2))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
}

blocks.name: mpt2curryd
blocks.content: The currying of an operation given in maps-to notation, splitting the operation (function of two arguments) into a function of the first argument, producing a function over the second argument. (Contributed by AV, 27-Oct-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm mpt2curryd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(ccur(c0), cmpt(s0, c1, cmpt(s1, c2, c3))))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c2, wcel(c3, c4))))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c2, emptycls))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  syl5eq(ccur(c0), cmpt(s0, c1, cmpt(s1, c2, c3)), cmpt(s0, cdm(cdm(c0)), copab(s1, hs0, wbr(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0, cv(hs0)))), w0)
  df-cur(s0, s1, hs0, c0)
  eqtrd(cmpt(s0, cdm(cdm(c0)), copab(s1, hs0, wbr(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0, cv(hs0)))), cmpt(s0, c1, cmpt(s1, c2, c3)), cmpt(s0, c1, copab(s1, hs0, wbr(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0, cv(hs0)))), w0)
  mpteq1d(s0, cdm(cdm(c0)), copab(s1, hs0, wbr(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0, cv(hs0))), c1, w0)
  eqtrd(cdm(cdm(c0)), c1, cdm(cxp(c1, c2)), w0)
  dmeqd(cdm(c0), cxp(c1, c2), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cdm(cxp(c1, c2)), c1), wne(c2, emptycls))
  dmxp(c2, c1)
  mpteq2dva(s0, c1, copab(s1, hs0, wbr(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0, cv(hs0))), cmpt(s1, c2, c3), w0)
  syl5req(copab(s1, hs0, wbr(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0, cv(hs0))), cmpt(s1, c2, c3), copab(s1, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  df-mpt(s1, hs0, c2, c3)
  opabbidv(s1, hs0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c3)), wbr(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0, cv(hs0)))
  3bitrrd(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c3)), wbr(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0, cv(hs0)), wa(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c0)), wceq(cfv(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), cv(hs0))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wceq(cfv(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), cv(hs0))))
  mp1i(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wb(wbr(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0, cv(hs0)), wa(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c0)), wceq(cfv(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), cv(hs0)))), wfun(c0))
  mpt2fun(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  funbrfv2b(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0))
  anbi1d(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c0)), wceq(cfv(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), cv(hs0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)))
  syl6bb(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cxp(c1, c2)))
  eleq2d(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c0), cxp(c1, c2), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cdm(c0), cxp(c1, c2)))
  syl(w0, wceq(cdm(c0), cxp(c1, c2)), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c2, wcel(c3, c4))))
  dmmpt2ga(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3, c4, c0)
  opelxp(cv(s0), cv(s1), c1, c2)
  syl5bb(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wceq(cfv(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), cv(hs0))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c3)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cfv(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), cv(hs0)))))
  an21(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2), wceq(cfv(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), cv(hs0)))
  pm5.32da(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cv(s1), c2), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cfv(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  bitrd(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cfv(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(hs0), c3), wceq(cfv(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), cv(hs0)))
  adantr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cv(s1), c2), wb(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cfv(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), cv(hs0))), wceq(cfv(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), cv(hs0))))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wb(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cfv(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), cv(hs0))), wceq(cfv(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), cv(hs0))))
  bicomd(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cfv(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), cv(hs0))), wceq(cfv(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), cv(hs0)))
  ibar(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cfv(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), cv(hs0)))
  syl6bb(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wceq(cfv(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c3), wceq(c3, cv(hs0)))
  eqeq1d(cfv(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), cv(hs0), c3, wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cv(s1), c2)))
  syl5eqr(cfv(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), c3, co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cv(s1), c2)))
  df-ov(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))
  ovmpt2d(hs1, hs2, cv(s0), c0, cv(s1), c3, c1, c2, csb(s1, cv(hs2), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c3)), c4, wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cv(s1), c2)))
  a1i(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wceq(c0, cmpo(hs1, hs2, c1, c2, csb(s1, cv(hs2), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c3)))))
  eqtri(c0, cmpo(hs1, hs2, c1, c2, csb(s1, cv(hs2), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c3))), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3))
  cbvmpt2(s0, s1, hs1, hs2, c1, c2, c3, csb(s1, cv(hs2), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c3)))
  nfcv(hs1, c3)
  nfcv(hs2, c3)
  nfcsb(s0, s1, cv(hs2), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c3))
  nfcv(s0, cv(hs2))
  nfcsb1v(s0, cv(hs1), c3)
  nfcsb1v(s1, cv(hs2), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c3))
  sylan9eq(c3, csb(s1, cv(hs2), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c3)), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c3), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs2)))
  csbeq1a(s1, cv(hs2), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c3))
  adantl(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wa(wceq(cv(hs1), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs2), cv(s1))), wceq(csb(s1, cv(hs2), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c3)), c3))
  sylan9eq(csb(s1, cv(hs2), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c3)), c3, csb(s1, cv(hs2), c3), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs2), cv(s1)))
  csbeq2dv(s1, cv(hs2), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c3), c3, wceq(cv(hs1), cv(s0)))
  equcoms(hs1, s0, wceq(csb(s0, cv(hs1), c3), c3))
  eqcomd(csb(s0, cv(hs1), c3), c3, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs1)))
  csbeq1a(s0, cv(hs1), c3)
  equcoms(hs2, s1, wceq(csb(s1, cv(hs2), c3), c3))
  eqcomd(csb(s1, cv(hs2), c3), c3, wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs2)))
  csbeq1a(s1, cv(hs2), c3)
  adantr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  simpr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cv(s1), c2))
  impl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(c3, c4))
  syl(w0, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wcel(c3, c4)), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c2, wcel(c3, c4))))
  rsp2(s0, s1, c1, c2, wcel(c3, c4))
  eqcom(c3, cv(hs0))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.cdm.s(s0, cdm(c0))
  diff.cdm.s(s0, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)

  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs2)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs2)

  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

thm mpt2curryd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → curry(c0)=(s0 ∈ c1 ↦(s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3)))
  ⊣ c0 =(s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c4)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ≠ ∅)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  syl5eq(curry(c0), (s0 ∈ c1 ↦(s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3)), (s0 ∈ dom(dom(c0))↦ { < s1, hs0 > | < s0, s1 >[c0]hs0 }), w0)
  df-cur(s0, s1, hs0, c0)
  eqtrd((s0 ∈ dom(dom(c0))↦ { < s1, hs0 > | < s0, s1 >[c0]hs0 }), (s0 ∈ c1 ↦(s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3)), (s0 ∈ c1 ↦ { < s1, hs0 > | < s0, s1 >[c0]hs0 }), w0)
  mpteq1d(s0, dom(dom(c0)), { < s1, hs0 > | < s0, s1 >[c0]hs0 }, c1, w0)
  eqtrd(dom(dom(c0)), c1, dom((c1 × c2)), w0)
  dmeqd(dom(c0), (c1 × c2), w0)
  syl(w0, dom((c1 × c2))= c1, c2 ≠ ∅)
  dmxp(c2, c1)
  mpteq2dva(s0, c1, { < s1, hs0 > | < s0, s1 >[c0]hs0 }, (s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3), w0)
  syl5req({ < s1, hs0 > | < s0, s1 >[c0]hs0 }, (s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3), { < s1, hs0 > |(s1 ∈ c2 ∧ hs0 = c3)}, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1))
  df-mpt(s1, hs0, c2, c3)
  opabbidv(s1, hs0, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1), (s1 ∈ c2 ∧ hs0 = c3), < s0, s1 >[c0]hs0)
  3bitrrd((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1), (s1 ∈ c2 ∧ hs0 = c3), < s0, s1 >[c0]hs0, (< s0, s1 > ∈ dom(c0)∧(c0 ` < s0, s1 >)= hs0), ((s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c2)∧(c0 ` < s0, s1 >)= hs0))
  mp1i((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1), (< s0, s1 >[c0]hs0 ↔(< s0, s1 > ∈ dom(c0)∧(c0 ` < s0, s1 >)= hs0)), Fun(c0))
  mpt2fun(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  funbrfv2b(c0, < s0, s1 >, hs0)
  anbi1d((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1), < s0, s1 > ∈ dom(c0), (c0 ` < s0, s1 >)= hs0, (s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c2))
  syl6bb((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1), < s0, s1 > ∈ dom(c0), (s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c2), < s0, s1 > ∈(c1 × c2))
  eleq2d(< s0, s1 >, dom(c0), (c1 × c2), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1))
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈ c1, dom(c0)=(c1 × c2))
  syl(w0, dom(c0)=(c1 × c2), ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c4)))
  dmmpt2ga(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3, c4, c0)
  opelxp(s0, s1, c1, c2)
  syl5bb((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1), ((s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c2)∧(c0 ` < s0, s1 >)= hs0), (s1 ∈ c2 ∧ hs0 = c3), (s1 ∈ c2 ∧(s0 ∈ c1 ∧(c0 ` < s0, s1 >)= hs0)))
  an21(s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c2, (c0 ` < s0, s1 >)= hs0)
  pm5.32da((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1), s1 ∈ c2, (s0 ∈ c1 ∧(c0 ` < s0, s1 >)= hs0), hs0 = c3)
  bitrd(((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)∧ s1 ∈ c2), (s0 ∈ c1 ∧(c0 ` < s0, s1 >)= hs0), hs0 = c3, (c0 ` < s0, s1 >)= hs0)
  adantr((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1), s1 ∈ c2, ((s0 ∈ c1 ∧(c0 ` < s0, s1 >)= hs0)↔(c0 ` < s0, s1 >)= hs0))
  adantl(w0, s0 ∈ c1, ((s0 ∈ c1 ∧(c0 ` < s0, s1 >)= hs0)↔(c0 ` < s0, s1 >)= hs0))
  bicomd(s0 ∈ c1, (s0 ∈ c1 ∧(c0 ` < s0, s1 >)= hs0), (c0 ` < s0, s1 >)= hs0)
  ibar(s0 ∈ c1, (c0 ` < s0, s1 >)= hs0)
  syl6bb(((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)∧ s1 ∈ c2), (c0 ` < s0, s1 >)= hs0, hs0 = c3, c3 = hs0)
  eqeq1d((c0 ` < s0, s1 >), hs0, c3, ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)∧ s1 ∈ c2))
  syl5eqr((c0 ` < s0, s1 >), c3, (s0[c0]s1), ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)∧ s1 ∈ c2))
  df-ov(s0, c0, s1)
  ovmpt2d(hs1, hs2, s0, c0, s1, c3, c1, c2, [hs2 / s1][hs1 / s0]c3, c4, ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)∧ s1 ∈ c2))
  a1i(((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)∧ s1 ∈ c2), c0 =(hs1 ∈ c1, hs2 ∈ c2 ↦[hs2 / s1][hs1 / s0]c3))
  eqtri(c0, (hs1 ∈ c1, hs2 ∈ c2 ↦[hs2 / s1][hs1 / s0]c3), (s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3))
  cbvmpt2(s0, s1, hs1, hs2, c1, c2, c3, [hs2 / s1][hs1 / s0]c3)
  nfcv(hs1, c3)
  nfcv(hs2, c3)
  nfcsb(s0, s1, hs2, [hs1 / s0]c3)
  nfcv(s0, hs2)
  nfcsb1v(s0, hs1, c3)
  nfcsb1v(s1, hs2, [hs1 / s0]c3)
  sylan9eq(c3, [hs2 / s1][hs1 / s0]c3, [hs1 / s0]c3, s0 = hs1, s1 = hs2)
  csbeq1a(s1, hs2, [hs1 / s0]c3)
  adantl(((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)∧ s1 ∈ c2), (hs1 = s0 ∧ hs2 = s1), [hs2 / s1][hs1 / s0]c3 = c3)
  sylan9eq([hs2 / s1][hs1 / s0]c3, c3, [hs2 / s1]c3, hs1 = s0, hs2 = s1)
  csbeq2dv(s1, hs2, [hs1 / s0]c3, c3, hs1 = s0)
  equcoms(hs1, s0, [hs1 / s0]c3 = c3)
  eqcomd([hs1 / s0]c3, c3, s0 = hs1)
  csbeq1a(s0, hs1, c3)
  equcoms(hs2, s1, [hs2 / s1]c3 = c3)
  eqcomd([hs2 / s1]c3, c3, s1 = hs2)
  csbeq1a(s1, hs2, c3)
  adantr((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1), s1 ∈ c2, s0 ∈ c1)
  simpr(w0, s0 ∈ c1)
